altername_name: How About a Nice Game of Chess!
How About a Nice Game of Chess?
name: How About a Nice Game of Chess
overview: Chess 7.5, a.k.a. "How about a nice game of chess!" (1984) is an early C64 program written by Larry Atkin, most famous for co-writing the Chess 3.x and 4.x series of programs that ruled the world of computer chess in most of the 70s.
